bibl.title: Female Circumcision as a Rite de passage in Egypt - Continuity through the Millennia? Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: I. Rituals and Cultural Continuity in Egypt. - II. Therapeuteria: A Party for a Little Girl in Egypt [θεραπευτερία appears in four papyri from Roman Egypt]. - III. Circumcision Parties in Modern Egypt. - IV. Female Circumcision in Classical Literature [in part. Herodotus]. - V. Documentary Evidence for Female Circumcision [U.P.Z. I, 2]. - VI. Islam. - VII. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Huebner Sabine R., Female Circumcision as a Rite de passage in Egypt - Continuity through the Millennia? Avec résumé en anglais.

I. Rituals and Cultural Continuity in Egypt. - II. Therapeuteria: A Party for a Little Girl in Egypt [θεραπευτερία appears in four papyri from Roman Egypt]. - III. Circumcision Parties in Modern Egypt. - IV. Female Circumcision in Classical Literature [in part. Herodotus]. - V. Documentary Evidence for Female Circumcision [U.P.Z. I, 2]. - VI. Islam. - VII. Conclusion.
